comments:
I20061017-0800

- paste this snippet into the Package Explorer (with nothing selected):
----
package a;
public class A { }
package a;
public class C {}
package b;
public class C { }
----

- select packages a and b, and choose context menu > Compare With > Each Other
- press Ctrl+. twice
- press Ctrl+,

=> Dialog and log entry:
